title: Packers scary win over Cardinals, Dak Prescott calf injury update, Vikings LB Eric Kendricks, Nate Burleson and NFL Week 8 Pigskin Picks!
itunes:title: Packers scary win over Cardinals, Dak Prescott calf injury update, Vikings LB Eric Kendricks, Nate Burleson and NFL Week 8 Pigskin Picks!
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Josh Cribbs open the Halloween weekend with the Packers stunning win over the Cardinals on Thursday Night Football. We discuss the coaching job done by Matt LaFleur and what could've been for Kyler Murray. The crew updates Dak Prescott's injury and we hear from Jameis Winston on facing the team that drafted him #1 overall in 2015. Nate Burleson drops by to discuss some of his Halloween favorites and Vikings LB Eric Kendricks looks ahead to his matchup with the Cowboys. Plus, the best matchups in NFL Week 8 and Pigskin Picks.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
